content.rendered:
Fun with Flows and best practices feat. Meighan Brodkey
WITDevs User GroupApril 15, 2020


Fun with Flows and best practices feat. Meighan Brodkey
For WITDevs User Group I presented on Flow on April 15 2020 virtually. The Talking about flow session covered flow basics, flow components, flow actions, flow best practices, and more.Post sesion there was time to answer questions about #VisualFlow, #ProcessBuilder and #Salesforce! It was a great turn out, tons offun and awesome connections with others with others learning some Salesforce tips and tricks.

The Presenters

Meighan Brodkey
Salesforce MVP and Technical Architect then Technical Architect that also Manages the Architecture Practice. Meighan went from admin to architect, taking the long path, and enjoyed the whole trip, gaining from the experiences and uses the admin, consultant, and prior in house life the better model projects from solution to deployment. Blogger – meighanrockssf.com, World Traveler for Salesforce – presented at Surf Force, North Africa Dreamin, YeurDreamin and more, taught admins and devs in the West Bank in 2017, 7x Dreamforce speaker, co-host of Salesforce Developer Podcast System Dot Debug, Ohana Slack admin & co-founder (learn about OhanaSlack here and sign up here). 

My Socials
Keep up to date by following us on these popular social networks.

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Curious about Einstein Bots, Flow, or the new Omni-Channel Routing functionality? In this episode of Automation Hour, you'll learn about AI and all of that inside of Salesforce from Technical Architect & Salesforce MVP, Meighan Brodkey.
